channel.title: Legal agreement
channel.description:
How would i make a legal agreement with someone wich is supposed to be written on paper by both me and the other person? I've done some research and some told me i should just do this -write both names of the persons -write exact date -autograph -and ofcourse the details of the agreement
Is this enough or do i need to "legalise" it?

item.title: Legal agreement
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

you could have someone write the contract in poop and as long as they sign it, its legal.

its just MORE legal if you have a witness sign it, and do everything perfect as mentioned above.

but its in no way neccesary

item.title: Legal agreement
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

[quote=“Attiusca, post:7, topic:258063”][quote author=Ske link=topic=340715.msg2638947#msg2638947 date=1232732929]

This might be useful

If you wonder what happens if this “someone” breeches it read below:

In the United States, in order to obtain damages for breach of contract or to obtain specific performance or other equitable relief, the aggrieved injured party may file a civil (non-criminal) lawsuit in state court (All from Wikipedia)

Thanks i’ll read it in a minute.

Tico, what if i want it to do by email or by fax? How would there be a witness?
I’ve also read that a witness is not necessary, but could be useful.
[/quote]

Get the fax machine to sign it.[/quote]
haha thanks for signing up just to post a reply on my thread

Anyone else who dealt with such situations or who knows some more information on this?
